--- title: 智能算法测试函数可视化 date: '2019-02-21' categories: 智能算法 --- ## 智能算法测试函数可视化(二维) ### 1 Sphere 函数 $$ f(x) = \sum^n_{i=1}x_i^2 $$ 全局最优点为$x =(0,0,\cdots ,0 ),f(x) =0$ ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ############################# #### 二维函数 --- 可视化 ############################## ## 1 、 Sphere 函数 f1_Sphere2 = function(x,y){ return(x^2 + y^2) } ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} y = x <- seq(-10, 10, 0.1) z <- outer(x, y, f1_Sphere2) library(plotly) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Loading required package: ggplot2 ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Attaching package: 'plotly' ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` The following object is masked from 'package:ggplot2': last_plot ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` The following object is masked from 'package:stats': filter ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` The following object is masked from 'package:graphics': layout ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} library(widgetframe) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Loading required package: htmlwidgets ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} p = plot_ly() %>% add_surface(x = ~x, y = ~y, z = ~z) frameWidget(p) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### 2 Schwefel 函数 $$ f(x) = \sum^n_i|x_i| + \prod^n_i|x_i| $$ 全局最优点为$x =(0,0,\cdots ,0 ),f(x) =0$ ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ## 2、Schwefel 函数 f2_Schwefel2 = function(x,y){ sum(abs(x),abs(y)) + abs(x)*abs(y) } ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} y = x <- seq(-10, 10, 0.1) z <- outer(x, y, f2_Schwefel2) p = plot_ly() %>% add_surface(x = ~x, y = ~y, z = ~z) frameWidget(p) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### 3 Rosenbrock 函数 $$ f(x) = \sum^n_{i=1} \left( 100 ( x_{i+1}- x_i^2 )^2+ (x_i -1)^2 \right) $$ 全局最优点为$x =(1,1,\cdots ,1 ),f(x) =0$ ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ## 3、Rosenbrock 函数 f2_Rosenbrock2 = function(x,y){ 100*(y-x^2)^2 + (x-1)^2 } ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} y = x <- seq(-10, 10, 0.1) z <- outer(x, y, f2_Rosenbrock2) p = plot_ly() %>% add_surface(x = ~x, y = ~y, z = ~z) frameWidget(p) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### 4、Rastrigin $$ f(x) = \sum_{i=1}^n \left( x_i^2 - 10cos(2\pi x_i) +10 \right) $$ 全局最优点为$x =(0,0,\cdots ,0 ),f(x) =0$ ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ## 4、Rastrigin f2_Rastrigin2 = function(x,y){ x^2-10*cos(2*pi*x)+10 + y^2-10*cos(2*pi*y)+10 } ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} y = x <- seq(-10, 10, 0.1) z <- outer(x, y, f2_Rastrigin2) p = plot_ly() %>% add_surface(x = ~x, y = ~y, z = ~z) frameWidget(p) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### 5 Griewank 函数 $$ f(x) = \frac{1}{4000}\sum_{i=1}^n x_i^2 -\prod^n_{i=1}cos\left( \frac{x_i}{\sqrt{i}}\right) +1 $$ 全局最优点为$x =(0,0,\cdots ,0 ),f(x) =0$ ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ## 5/Griewank 函数 f2_Griewank = function(x,y){ 1/4000 *(x^2+y^2)-cos(x/1)*cos(y/sqrt(2))+1 } ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} y = x <- seq(-10, 10, 0.1) z <- outer(x, y, f2_Griewank) p = plot_ly() %>% add_surface(x = ~x, y = ~y, z = ~z) frameWidget(p) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### 6 Ackley 函数 $$ f(x) = -20 Exp \left(-0.2 \times \sqrt{\frac{1}{30} \sum_{i=1}^n x_i^2 } \right) - Exp \left(\sqrt{\frac{1}{30} \cos(2 \pi x_i) } \right) +20 +e $$ 全局最优点为$x =(0,0,\cdots ,0 ),f(x) =0$ ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ## 6 Ackley 函数 f2_Ackley2 = function(x,y){ -20*exp(-0.2*sqrt(1/30 * (x^2+y^2))) -exp(1/30*(cos(2*pi*x)+cos(2*pi*y)))+20+exp(1) } ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} y = x <- seq(-10, 10, 0.1) z <- outer(x, y, f2_Ackley2) p = plot_ly() %>% add_surface(x = ~x, y = ~y, z = ~z) frameWidget(p) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### 7 Noise函数 $$ f(x) = \sum_{i=1}^nix_i^4 + rand[0,1) $$ 全局最优点为$x =(0,0,\cdots ,0 ),f(x) =0$ ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ## 7 、Noise函数 f2_Niose2 = function(x,y){ x^4+2*y^2 + rnorm(1,0,1) } ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} y = x <- seq(-10, 10, 0.1) z <- outer(x, y, f2_Niose2) p = plot_ly() %>% add_surface(x = ~x, y = ~y, z = ~z) frameWidget(p) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ### 8 shaffer函数 $$ f(x) = \frac{\sin^2(\sqrt{x_i^2 +x_2^2}) - 0.5 }{[1+0.001(x_1+x_2)]^2} - 0.5 $$ 全局最优点为$x =(0,0,\cdots ,0 ),f(x) = -1$ ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ## 8/shaffer函数 f2_shaffer2 = function(x,y){ (sin(x^2+y^2)^2 -0.5)/(1+0.001*(x^2+y^2))^2 - 0.5 } ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} y = x <- seq(-10, 10, 0.1) z <- outer(x, y, f2_shaffer2) p = plot_ly() %>% add_surface(x = ~x, y = ~y, z = ~z) frameWidget(p) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} sessionInfo() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` R version 4.2.1 (2022-06-23) Platform: aarch64-apple-darwin20 (64-bit) Running under: macOS Monterey 12.5.1 Matrix products: default BLAS: /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions/4.2-arm64/Resources/lib/libRblas.0.dylib LAPACK: /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions/4.2-arm64/Resources/lib/libRlapack.dylib locale: [1] en_US.UTF-8/en_US.UTF-8/en_US.UTF-8/C/en_US.UTF-8/en_US.UTF-8 attached base packages: [1] stats graphics grDevices utils datasets methods base other attached packages: [1] widgetframe_0.3.1 htmlwidgets_1.5.4 plotly_4.10.0 ggplot2_3.3.6 loaded via a namespace (and not attached): [1] pillar_1.8.1 compiler_4.2.1 tools_4.2.1 digest_0.6.29 [5] viridisLite_0.4.1 jsonlite_1.8.0 evaluate_0.16 lifecycle_1.0.1 [9] tibble_3.1.8 gtable_0.3.0 pkgconfig_2.0.3 rlang_1.0.4 [13] cli_3.3.0 DBI_1.1.3 rstudioapi_0.14 crosstalk_1.2.0 [17] yaml_2.3.5 xfun_0.32 fastmap_1.1.0 httr_1.4.4 [21] withr_2.5.0 stringr_1.4.1 dplyr_1.0.9 knitr_1.40 [25] generics_0.1.3 vctrs_0.4.1 grid_4.2.1 tidyselect_1.1.2 [29] data.table_1.14.2 glue_1.6.2 R6_2.5.1 fansi_1.0.3 [33] rmarkdown_2.16.1 farver_2.1.1 tidyr_1.2.0 purrr_0.3.4 [37] magrittr_2.0.3 scales_1.2.1 htmltools_0.5.3 assertthat_0.2.1 [41] colorspace_2.0-3 utf8_1.2.2 stringi_1.7.8 lazyeval_0.2.2 [45] munsell_0.5.0 ``` ::: :::
